events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the highway involving their car and another vehicle.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial claim details and keywords provided.
An insurance agent was assigned to the customer’s case to provide dedicated support throughout the claim process.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and confirmation sent to the customer with reference number and next steps.
Requested the customer to submit the police report, vehicle damage photos, and driver’s license copy for claim verification.
Customer uploaded all the required documents including accident photos and official police report through the online portal.
The claim investigation team has begun reviewing submitted documents and statements to assess liability and damage.
Completed the investigation confirming liability and extent of damages sustained during the accident to the insured vehicle.
Proposed a settlement amount to cover vehicle repairs and associated costs based on investigation findings and policy limits.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the timely communications.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance manager authorizing the release of settlement funds to the customer.
Settlement payment was issued directly to the customer’s bank account to cover repair costs as per the agreement.
The insurance claim has been closed following successful payment and confirmation that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived in the system for record keeping and future reference.
